Creating Shapes.description: Demonstrating the capabilities and variations of the torus() primitive

Creating Shapes.description: Using a 3D bezier path to create a solid tube

Creating Shapes.description: Demonstrating the advanced extrusion using slices with varying numbers of points.

Creating Shapes.description: Using a 1D bezier function to create a non-uniform extrusion

Manipulating Shapes.description: Demonstrating the basics of boolean shape combinations

Manipulating Shapes.description: Demonstrating aligning shapes using the align function

Manipulating Shapes.title: Expanding 2D and 3D Shapes
Manipulating Shapes.description: Exploring the expand() function on 2D and 3D geometries

Manipulating Shapes.title: Offsetting 2D Shapes
Manipulating Shapes.description: Demonstrating the offset() function. Moves all points in a 2d path or 2D geometry perpendicular to the line's tangent.

Manipulating Shapes.description: Examples of measureArea() and measureVolume() function
